mean_cn: n. 侦探猎犬，毫不放松的追赶着，侦探
mean_en: a large dog that has very long ears and a very good sense of smell and that is often used for finding people and for hunting
sentence: My bloodhound has an incredible sense of smell.
sentence_trans: 我的侦探猎犬嗅觉惊人的灵敏。
word_etyma: blood使先取得经验 ＋ hound追猎 → bloodhound侦探猎犬
